name: Jumping Ninja man (Beta, not fully completed)
name_original: Jumping Ninja man (Beta, not fully completed)
description: Jumping Ninja man might sound a little basic like a mobile ad game but as you can kinda see by the picture you play as a ninja man jumping onto platforms trying to get your treasure back BUT there are walls of lava so make sure not to touch them. There are currently only 2 stages right now since the game is still in development and isn't fully ready (More will be added soon in future updates and all that stuff) (After all this is the first game I've made so please enjoy it and leave a comment what I should add)
